subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Robin Soderling beat David Ferrer of Spain, 6-2, 6-2, to win the Swedish Open in Bastad for the second time in three years. The fifth-ranked Soderling, a Swede, has won four tournaments this year.
snippet: Robin Soderling beat David Ferrer of Spain, 6-2, 6-2, to win the Swedish Open in Bastad for the second time in three years. The fifth-ranked Soderling, a Swede, has won four tournaments this year.
